summary: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.
cast: Jack Nicholson|Karen Black|Billy Green Bush|Fannie Flagg|Sally Struthers|Marlena MacGuire|Richard Stahl|Lois Smith|Helena Kallianiotes|Toni Basil|Lorna Thayer|Susan Anspach|Ralph Waite|William Challee|John P. Ryan|Irene Dailey|Clay Greenbush|Bob Rafelson
title: Mi vida es mi vida
